queries.query: CREATE TABLE `person` (`id` INT NOT NULL,`name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',`lastname` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`))COLLATE='latin1_spanish_ci';
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 'producto' ( 'id' INTEGER, 'name' TEXT, 'desc' TEXT, 'precio' INTEGER DEFAULT 0, 'stock' INTEGER DEFAULT 1, PRIMARY KEY('id' AUTOINCREMENT))
